title-group.article-title: A Priori Estimates and Analysis of a Numerical Method for a Turning Point Problem

abstract.p: Bounds are obtained for the derivatives of the solution of a turning point problem. These results suggest a modification of the El-Mistikawy Werle finite difference scheme at the turning point. A uniform error estimate is obtained for the resulting method, and illustrative numerical results are given.
